abstract: Two researchers warn that the entry of big companies like Microsoft and Google into the field of electronic health records could alter the practice of clinical research and raise new challenges to privacy.
snippet: Two researchers warn that the entry of big companies like Microsoft and Google into the field of electronic health records could alter the practice of clinical research and raise new challenges to privacy.
lead_paragraph: In an article in The New England Journal of Medicine, two leading researchers warn that the entry of big companies like Microsoft and Google into the field of personal health records could drastically alter the practice of clinical research and raise new challenges to the privacy of patient records.

headline.main: Warning on Storage of Health Records
headline.print_headline: Safeguards Sought on Web Health Data

abstract: How do I see embedded comments in Microsoft Word?
snippet: How do I see embedded comments in Microsoft Word?
lead_paragraph: Q. How do I see embedded comments in Microsoft Word? I often get Word documents and files in the Rich Text Format that are supposed to have comments, but I can never find them.

abstract: Shareholders, to be sure, will collect their payment, but Microsoft will likely need to offer financial incentives to prevent engineers and managers from hopping to other jobs.
snippet: Shareholders, to be sure, will collect their payment, but Microsoft will likely need to offer financial incentives to prevent engineers and managers from hopping to other jobs.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft’s pursuit of Yahoo, if successful, will leave it with more than one bill due.

headline.main: Extra Cost to Buy Yahoo: Retention Pay
headline.print_headline: Extra Cost to Buy Yahoo: Retention Pay
